verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Great is the Lord God Almighty newline Great is the Lord on High newline The train of His robe fills the temple newline And we cry out highest praise

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Glory to the risen King newline Glory to the son, glorious son

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Lift up your heads, open the doors newline Let the King of Glory come in newline And forever be our God

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Holy is the Lord God Almighty newline Holy is the Lord on High newline Let all the earth bow before You newline And crown You Lord of all
